Earn ₦850K in 8 Weeks with Photography, Videography & Photo Editing (No Expensive Gear Needed)

Yes, you read that right! You don’t need a fancy camera, expensive software, or prior experience to become a highly paid photographer, videographer, and photo editor. With the right skills, you can create stunning photos, cinematic videos, and professional edits—all while earning ₦850,000+ monthly working with brands, influencers, businesses, and event organizers.

If you’ve always wanted to capture amazing moments, create high-quality videos, and edit like a pro, this course will teach you everything step by step—even if you’re starting from scratch!

Let's Get Started

Here's Why You NEED
to Act NOW!

This course is your shortcut to launching a high-paying photography, videography, and photo editing career, and we’ve broken it down into easy-to-follow steps, even for absolute beginners.

Our Photography, Videography & Editing Mastery Program is designed to help ANYONE—whether you’re a student, freelancer, job seeker, or aspiring creative—earn ₦850,000+ monthly by mastering high-demand media production skills that businesses and brands need.

It doesn’t matter if:

  • You don’t own a professional camera (we’ll teach you how to shoot amazing content using just your smartphone or any camera!).
  • You’ve never taken a professional photo or edited before (we’ll break it down step by step!).
  • You don’t know anything about video production (we’ll teach you how to shoot and edit like a pro!).
  • You don’t know where to find clients or jobs (we’ll show you exactly how to get paying clients!).
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦1,000,000

Photography Fundamentals

Master camera settings, lighting, composition, and angles for stunning shots.

Smartphone Photography & Editing

Learn how to capture and edit high-quality photos using just your smartphone.

Videography & Cinematic Shooting

Understand how to shoot professional-grade videos for brands, events, and YouTube.

Photo Editing & Retouching

Learn how to enhance images using Lightroom, Photoshop, and mobile apps.

Content Creation for Social Media & Business

Learn how to create Instagram reels, TikTok videos, YouTube content, and ads.

Freelancing & Client Acquisition

Discover how to start earning ₦850,000+ monthly by working with brands, businesses, and influencers.

Event & Product Photography

Learn how to shoot weddings, birthdays, corporate events, and product photography for online stores.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Aspiring Content Creators & Influencers

Learn how to shoot and edit professional videos for YouTube, TikTok & Instagram.

2

Event Planners & Social Media Managers

Gain professional skills in event photography, video editing, and marketing content creation.

3

Freelancers Who Want to Earn More

Expand your services and start charging premium rates for photography & video production.

4

Business Owners & Entrepreneurs Who Want to Market Their Brands

Save money and learn to create high-quality content without hiring a professional.

Enroll Now

The Price? Practically a Giveaway

We’ve priced this course at ₦1,000,000 because that’s what it’s truly worth, but here’s the deal:

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦700,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦400,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦600,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Days
Hours
Minutes
Seconds
Enroll Now

we’re here to Answer all your questions

Do I need prior experience in photography or video editing?

No! You can start with just your smartphone, and we’ll show you exactly how to run digital marketing campaigns, manage clients, and make money using mobile-friendly tools. However, having a laptop in the future will help scale your earnings faster.

 

Do I need an expensive camera or professional gear for this training?

No! You can start with your smartphone or any camera you have. We will teach you how to shoot high-quality content using affordable tools before upgrading to professional equipment.

How long will it take before I can start making money?

This is an 8-week structured program, and by the end of the training, you’ll be able to shoot, edit, and deliver professional content for clients and brands. However, your success depends on how much you practice.

Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! You will receive a recognized digital certificate that you can use to apply for media-related jobs, freelance gigs, or content creation opportunities.

What are the requirements to join this course?

📌 A smartphone or camera (we will teach you how to start with any device).
📌 Internet access for practical lessons.
📌 A willingness to learn and practice consistently.

 

don't Miss Out
Act Now !!!!

This offer is STRICTLY for action-takers. The ₦400,000 discount is only valid for those who sign up TODAY.

  • The price will revert to ₦1,000,000 after 24 hours.
  • Only 30 slots are available to ensure personalized attention.
Secure your Spot !!!
